1: Yɛn a vey na Kundung Wuna-na-Sira Dagwi o ko ba tɛ̀ gwɛ e buk de Davit a ga kana yong yaga gwɛ. Ano kwong, yɛn a nása nenɔrɔ yas de be rangas tanga nenɔrɔ wuna nesa vɔk na Dagwi.
2: E bama de Davit a ga yɛnɛ nása nenɔrɔ nane, a tɛ̀ a bemat o nerat e ji reza Dagwi Darwey.
3: Ko a nɔng kawɛ rwas na hwā e ji BeIsrayɛl regat kpam-tuk, na cɛk namâ rangas, tanga nèy anap de ba shumung.
4: Davit a tɛ̀ behak e ji BeLevi be ra fwom Dagwi Darwey, Dagwi BeIsrayɛl e nuyel kundung o, yɛn a ra won, yɛn a feng, ko yɛn a somo hɛ arɔng.
5: Ba tɛ̀ Asaf a sè mwat nuyel mɛn, ko Zɛkarya à mwat sɛlɛ mɛ. Bemat râ yōm à Yɛyɛl, na Shɛmiramɔt, na Yɛhiyɛl, na Matitiya, na Ɛliyap, na Bɛnaya, na Ɔbɛt-Ɛdɔm tanga Yɛyɛl. Asaf a ra lwɛlɛ na bapey lwɛlɛ,
6: ko Bɛnaya na Yahaziyɛl bepiris yɛn a dopse pɛsɛl bezing kayɛ jeng e nuyel kundung o.
7:
E tuk a hane de Davit a pere nɔ̂ng Asaf na besa fwom mɛ BeLevi fwom ra lɛlɛ̂ somô Dagwi Darwey.

(Lɛlɛ
8:
Feng in a Dagwi Darwey,
moklo hin mwat de a sé,
há in e ji yére bemat jey tomong mɛ!
9:
Rá in a yɛ lwɛlɛ, dak in a yɛ yōm,
há in mwa pyɛ̂ langat de a ga ra!
10:
Dak in kaa na Dagwi wo jɛrɛ,
tik neyey vemo de be re a Dagwi Darwey fongol ne pɛngɛ.
11:
Wɔ́ in na Dagwi Darwey, yaga a sé wo reto,
jama hin hɛ kayɛ jeng.
13:
À yin yére Abraham, sam Dagwi,
à yin yére Yakɔp, de Dagwi a kasa,
bàre hin tomong langat de a ga ra,
bàre hin pyɛ̂ bes mɛ na shɔt de a ga yɛrɛ.
14:
Dagwi Darwey yɛ wɛ à Dagwi mot,
Badu mɛ be ra jey mwa.
15:
E ye bam à wuna-na-sira mɛ gbak-gbak wɛt,
e gyeng nu de a nɔng a nezamang gu.
16:
Sira mɛ de a wuna na Abraham,
de a ra a Yishak na sira arɔng.
17:
A to ha a Yakɔp e ra hɛ na he tɛ́ ɛ redu,
a nɔ̂ng Israyɛl hɛ na he nàra gbak-gbak.
18:
A ye, “Mê nɔng o sevwel Kanaan,
hê sè nap mo, hwo tanga yere mo.”
19:
E jeng o, yɛn á sè pyak wɛt,
bá sè hyehyet zɔng, bá sè sangâl rekyen e vwel o.
20:
Ba kyě rini yi e yére bemat jey vemo vɔk e vere,
yi e segwɔm hak vɔk e hak.
21:
Mwa ano, Dagwi Darwey a tik mwat hwak
a midra a yɛn wɛt,
a hwɔtɔ a begbɔng gwɔ̀m betong yaga yɛn.
22:
A ye, “Yin kwon ra bemat hom de ma ga tik jaram,
kɛ yin mǎ bezarap me wɛt!”
23:
Rá in a Dagwi Darwey lwɛlɛ, à yin bemat jey mwa!
Kahɛ tuk, mok in yɛgɛt yat wɔgɔ, “A ga sey ot!”
24:
Há in e ji yére bemat jey mwa gbɔng nerey mɛ,
mok in e ji bemasi mwa pyɛ̂ bes mɛ!
25:
Dagwi Darwey a sé gbɔng o,
a vey na be nɔng ɛ nerey ding-ding,
be sap ɛ e ra cī mwa.
26:
Mwa yére dyuk yé re a pyɛ́ de ba yong fongol,
ko Dagwi Darwey yɛ wɛ a yong lagwi.
27:
Gbɔng nerey na nedyɛt gbɔng nerat mɛ na gwɔrɔ hɛ,
reto na gbɔng nerat ne sila duk re a yɛ fongol.
28:
À yin yére bemat jey mwa,
somo hin gbɔng nerey na retô Dagwi Darwey!
29:
Nɔng in hɛ nerey de na jam yaga yɛ!
Vey in na nenɔrɔ min, yel in mɛ e lalâ Gbɔng Duk mɛ,
Yɛ a sé wo jɛrɛ. Ré in a yɛ fongol
jeng de ê dura nedyɛt gbɔng nerat mɛ!
30:
Vow in e nuyel mɛ, à yin bemat jey mwa.
Mok in à yére bemat jey mwa wɔgɔ,
Dagwi Darwey a sé gbɔng gwɔ̀m!
Jey ya tumal gak, vit à pyɛ cak de yê dikta yɛ.
31:
Tik lagwi wo vɔk yey pyɛng,
tik jey ye rɛ̌ na nzem.
Há in a yére bemat jey mwa wɔgɔ,
“Dagwi Darwey a sé re negwɔm.”
32:
Tik gworep na kayɛ pyɛ e ji gwɛ be wus!
Tik na hiri na kayɛ pyɛ de ye ras e ji vɛ be mok lwɛlɛ!
33:
Ano, batin cɔ́gɔt rehwot bê ra biibi,
yaga Dagwi Darwey e kyè vey re negwɔm e ra jey.
34:
Feng in a Dagwi Darwey yaga a sé rwat;
tɛ̂ yey mɛ ha sé gbak-gbak.
35:
Sey ot, à Dagwi Darwey, Dagwi mot!
Tula hot yi e yére dyuk
na wot somo hwo, wo jɛrɛ,
na wot dak kaa e somo mō mó.
36:
Bē somo Dagwi Darwey, Dagwi BeIsrayɛl
yi e susu mo vɔk e nuyel gbak-gbak!
Bemat mwa ba ye, “Ano”, ko ba somo Dagwi Darwey!
37: Davit a tɛ̀ Asaf na begwa mɛ e nuyel Kundung Wuna-na-Sira Dagwi na yɛn a ragas fwom e hwomo kayɛ jeng, tyɛng na pyɛ de be simo be ragas kahɛ tuk.
38: A to tɛ̀ Ɔbɛt-Ɛdɔm Yɛdutun tanga bemat yi e ruhup mɛn, yɛn kuru batyiimin na vɛ rwit  be sɛlɛ hɛn na fwom o. Ba to nɔ̂ng Ɔbɛt-Ɛdɔm na Hosa fwom gyeng rùhup repomo arɔng.
39: A to tɛ̀ Zadɔk piris tanga besa fwom mɛ be ragas fwom e kwɔ̂n sangal Dagwi Darwey e rahwol de wa sé e Gibɛyɔn.
40: Kanɛ nagasi na nahywegelek yɛn e nása nenɔrɔ̂ yas de be rangas burang tyɛng na pyɛ de ba jɛk e Bwok-basa Badu de Dagwi Darwey a nɔng BeIsrayɛl.
41: A tɛ̀ Heman, na Yɛdutun na bwang behak de ba kasa na baza mɛn be dopse feng a Dagwi Darwey yaga e tɛ̀ yey na bemat mɛ nesheneshey.
42: Ko a sé e Heman tanga Yɛdutun o de ba vɔk fwôm pɛsɛl bezing, na bapey lwɛlɛ tanga pyɛ̂ lwɛlɛ mo cak de be ragas e jeng lɛlɛ̂ sómo Dagwi. A sé e nèy bewen Yɛdutun o de be gyeng rùhup repomo.
43: E bama pyɛ́ yemo mwa, kawɛ mwat a kyè wɛrɛ, ko Davit a wɛrɛ arɔng, na a wɔ̀ tɛ̀ a belɔ mɛ nerat.
